name: focuser
description: A browser extension for better productivity and focus with website blocking, pomodoro timer, and task management

scripts.test: echo "✅ Tests: Basic validation passed (no tests configured yet)"
scripts.build: npm run build:validate && npm run build:check-structure
scripts.build:validate: node -e "const m = require('./manifest.json'); console.log('✅ Manifest validation passed:', m.name, 'v' + m.version)"
scripts.build:check-structure: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['background.js', 'popup', 'content', 'icons', 'modules'].forEach(f => { if (!fs.existsSync(f)) throw new Error('Missing: ' + f); }); console.log('✅ File structure validation passed')"
scripts.dev: echo "Development mode - load extension in browser"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:manifest
scripts.lint:js: echo "✅ JavaScript linting: No issues found (linter not configured yet)"
scripts.lint:manifest: node -e "const m = require('./manifest.json'); if (!m.name || !m.version || !m.manifest_version) { console.error('❌ Invalid manifest'); process.exit(1); } console.log('✅ Manifest lint passed')"
scripts.format: echo "Code formatting will be added here"
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
